title: Watchmaker Richard Mille Had a Big Weekend in the World of Sports
text:
Rafael Nadal of Spain, wearing a Richard Mille RM27-03, celebrates with the championship trophy. Clive Brunskill/Getty Images

Text size

The Swiss luxury watchmaker Richard Mille may have more reasons to celebrate than US Open champion Rafael Nadal.

Over the weekend, the brand made headlines at two of the biggest sporting events in the U.S. Not only did the 33-year-old Spanish tennis star, a long-time brand ambassador for Richard Mille, wear its $725,000 wristwatch at the US Open final, NFL player Odell Beckham, Jr. also sported a Richard Mille timepiece during the Cleveland Browns’ season opener on Sunday.

During the almost five-hour tennis match, Nadal fought off 23-year-old Russian player Daniil Medvedev to win his 19th Grand Slam title. His Richard Mille RM27-03 watch was also seen by fans in the stadium and watching on television every time he wiped perspiration from his forehead.
description: Tennis star Rafael Nadal and NFL player Odell Beckham Jr. wore this luxury brand during matches
